channel.title: Github on Nefelibata
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Nefelibata

item.title: Github新建仓库并添加本地代码
item.description: 1 create a new repository on the command line 1echo "# vue3_test" >> README.md 2git init 3git add . 4git commit -m "first commit" 5git branch -M main 6git remote add origin https://github.com/HuuuuuuO/vue3_test.git 7git push -u origin main 2 push an existing repository from the command line 1git remote add origin https://github.com/HuuuuuuO/vue3_test.git 2git branch -M main 3git push -u origin main

item.title: Hugo：日常更新流程
item.description: 1、新建文章 进入blog本地仓库，新疆文章，写文章并修改 1cd F:\vscode\hugo-root 2hugo new post/文章名字.md 2、本地验证 1hugo serve -D --disableFastRender 2或 3hugo serve 3、更新public目录
